name: Jewel Block Brick Puzzle
description:
Relax with Block Puzzle Galaxy - the classic puzzle game. Easy to play but hard to master.

You have to think carefully before you drop blocks. Choose a reasonable position for each blocks depending on their shapes. It is really a casual puzzle game for your free time. You won't stop playing it once you start the game!

All you need just use your finger to drop the blocks and create the lines with 3 same colors on the screen. The more lines you create, the high scores you can get. You can also create combo 4 or 5 to get more scores. Be careful with big blocks, you will get troubles if not enough space for it.

This is a casual puzzle game but will definitely bring you many interesting surprises.

Feature
- Simple play and easy control
- No need internet
- Suitable for all ages and genders
- Various block shape
- No time limited

Play and relax anywhere and anytime you want! Let's download now!
